title: Healthcare
text: Our agents automate complex processes, from benefits explanation to medication adherence support, ensuring clarity and compliance across all interactions. Enhance operational workflows, reduce administrative burdens, and deliver superior member service with AI that understands the nuances of pharmacy benefits and healthcare planning.

widgetOne.text: Thank you for calling ABC Medicare, who am I speaking with?

widgetTwo.text: Got it, great to meet you {name}! Are you calling about a new plan, an existing plan, or something else?

title: Real Estate
text: Scale your sales operations like never before. Whether you're a broker, a firm, or a wholesaler, never miss a lead again! Your own AI ISA at your service.

widgetOne.text: Hello! This is Monica from Chandler Bing Brokerages. I saw you requested information about our listing in Beverly Hills. Are you looking to schedule an appointment?

widgetTwo.text: Got it, yes this is the {api.numSqft} Square Foot property, right on Monte Cielo, in the heart of Beverly Hills.

title: Government
text: Drive political engagement and make every voice heard with technology that bridges gaps and fosters democracy. Designed for PACs, campaigns, and advocacy groups, our agents not only streamline outreach and personalize interactions with voters but also seamlessly facilitate connections between constituents and their representatives.

widgetOne.text: Hi {name}, hope you're doing well! How is {api.interest} going? Just calling in to see if you registered to vote for the upcoming Primary elections!

widgetTwo.text: It's crucial help elect {api.nominee} so they can help voters like you! Are you interested in committing?

title: Insurance
text: Scale your sales operations like never before. Whether you're a broker, a firm, or a wholesaler, never miss a lead again! Your own AI ISA at your service.

widgetOne.text: Thank you for calling XYZ Car Insurance. Are you calling about your policy for {api.carType}?

widgetTwo.text: Got it. You've been in an accident. I'm going to ask you a few questions before transferring, first, are you ok?

title: Legal
text: Our AI Agents screen leads, welcome new clients, pencil in appointments, handle payments, pass along your messages with outbound calls, and do so much more!

widgetOne.text: Hello {name}, thank you for calling T&C Legal. Let me check your account real quick!

widgetTwo.text: Thanks for waiting. Looks like you {api.numDocs} with us. Where you looking to discuss those or start a new service with us?

title: Services/Utilities
text: Revolutionize your scheduling, appointment setting, and everything else with AI that understands your client's needs. Perfect for hospitality & travel, consumer services, financial services, and more.

widgetOne.text: Thank you for calling Acme Home Remodeling, how can I help?

widgetTwo.text: Sure, we can definitely help out with your dream home renovation project. Is this a full home or partial renovation?
